title: Trickery Domain
content: take half damage. 18m CON Save Concentration Mass Cure Wounds Lv 5 Evocation Action 6-7 Healing 3d8+3Unleash a soothing hum of energy that heals you and nearby allies. No effect on undead and constructs. 18m Planar Binding Lv 5 Abjuration Action Target an otherworldly creature and attach its consciousness to your own.
